headline: Is EPAM Systems Fairly Priced After Recent Rebound in 2025?
summary: If you are wondering whether EPAM Systems at around $208 is a bargain or a value trap, you are in the right place to unpack what the current price is really telling us. The stock has bounced about 4% over the last week and 14% over the past month, even though it is still down 9.2% year to date and 17.8% over the last year. This suggests sentiment is shifting, but the long term picture is still bruised. That rebound has come as investors refocus on EPAM's role as a high end digital...
